summary: This is a modification of the useless help menu section "Blacksmith Forges". The menus contents has been replaced with information that might actually be useful, pertaining to mastering skills in question, and producing powerful gear.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/test.png?w=920[/img]

[center][size=30]Informative Blacksmith[/size][/center]
An elaboration of use pertaining to each tool, Grindstone, Workbench, Forges, Anvil, Tanning Rack, and Smelter, which is followed by an explanation of the Skill tree, Perks and their effects, Armour classes, Weapon Classes, The Steed Stone, Item Quality and Armour and Weapon Improvement, and a bit about Fortify Smithing potions and enchanted Fortify Smithing gear. Also, the menu now ends with a long list of Smithing material item codes for Skyrim, Dawnguard, Hearthfire & Dragonborn.

[center][youtube]npvW-wmjrKw[/youtube][/center]

Drail3 mods are light weight by design. This means that none of my mods will make your game lag or drop your fps. My mods are script free and have one goal, which is to assist you in making the most of your character development. The Informative Series is a set of mods that explain how Skyrim works in greater depth than Bethesda provided in the Help Menu or interactive objects. So far, the [i]Informative Series[/i] is composed of the following.

I thank you all very much for taking the time to view my mods. Please comment and endorse if you enjoy them. If you would like to use any of my mods as part of your own, you need only ask, and give me credit.
